Sentencas: We present a Hubbard-corrected density functional theory (DFT+U) study of the adsorption and reduction reactions of oxygen on the pure and 25% Ca-doped LaMnO3 (LCM25) {100} and {110} surfaces.
Titulo: Ab initio investigation of O2 adsorption on Ca-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of oxygen vacancies on the adsorption characteristics and energetics has also been investigated.
Titulo: Ab initio investigation of O2 adsorption on Ca-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our results show that the O-2 adsorption/reduction process occurs through the formation of superoxide and peroxide intermediates, with the Mn sites found to be generally more active than the La sites.
Titulo: Ab initio investigation of O2 adsorption on Ca-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The LCM25{110} surface is found to be more efficient for O-2 reduction than the LCM25{100} surface due to its stronger adsorption of O-2, with the superoxide and peroxide intermediates shown to be energetically more favorable at the Mn sites than at the Ca sites.
Titulo: Ab initio investigation of O2 adsorption on Ca-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, oxygen vacancy defect sites on both the {100} and {110} surfaces are shown to be more efficient for O-2 reduction, as reflected in the higher adsorption energies calculated on the defective surfaces compared to the perfect surfaces.
Titulo: Ab initio investigation of O2 adsorption on Ca-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We show from Lowdin population analysis that the O-2 adsorption on the pure and 25% Ca-doped LaMnO3 surfaces is characterized by charge transfer from the interacting surface species into the adsorbed oxygen (g) orbital, which results in weakening of the O-O bonds and its subsequent reduction.
Titulo: Ab initio investigation of O2 adsorption on Ca-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The elongated O-O bonds were confirmed via vibrational frequency analysis.
Titulo: Ab initio investigation of O2 adsorption on Ca-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells
